page.title: 17RECREATION IN DUMFRIES(cont)
page.content: Queens play for the Scottish league division 2,there are 13 teams in the league and each team plays a total of 39 games.Queens finished with a total of 34 points and finished eighth in the league.The highest crowd of the season was 5800 in the scottish cup fourth round against Dundee United. Queens were the fourth best supported side in the second division this season even though crowds were down by 3000 on last season.Their highest win of the season was 3_0 against Berwick Rangers and Raith Rovers and their biggest defeat was 4_0 against Dunfermline and Berwick Rangers.
